Html:
I am very interested in the polling functionality and the forums. I am building a site for my Bass Club and this is awesome. I know just enough to be dangerous so thanks a million for the head start.

Thanks
John

We should be starting v3 next week (Monday probably). v3 beta 1 should be 2 weeks from that point and final being in 4 weeks from now.

Bass as in the fish or the instrument?

The Fish. I am building a site for my fishing clug in Texas but now that I am moving to TN we will be sharing the site as I plan to start a new division in Chattanooga.

Which one is yours?

I am very excited about the Forum and Polling sections in V3. We use a Yahoo group now but we grew tired of that about a year ago and our sponsors would appriciate a site also.

Thanks
John

Mine is the instrument... I'm a classical double bass player.

The polling and forums will be really awesome... they will be homemade!

Any update on the V3 status?

Thanks
John
